code: import{DONATE_NOW}from"./actionTypes/DonationTypes";var initialState={donations:0};var donationData=function donationData(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case DONATE_NOW:return{donations:action.payload};default:return state;}};export default donationData;
